subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Bruce H. and Mike C. and everyone else
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Cool Mike Thanks =) I cant wait to hear it!

Misty


--- On Fri, 11/21/08, M.A. Coletta (Mike) <michaelcoletta@...> wrote:

> From: M.A. Coletta (Mike) <michaelcoletta@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Bruce H. and Mike C. and everyone else
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Friday, November 21, 2008, 3:13 PM
> Thanks, Misty.  I hear you loud and clear...
> 
> I'm just finishing up on another little research device
> I'll be 
> sharing with the group before the day's out.
> It's similar to my last diode thing, just a slight bit
> different.
> I hope it works...
> 
> - Mike C. (UFO Geek)
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Misty"
> <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
> >
> > >>The following person would like to join the
> EVP-ITC group:
> > Email address: balllan94 <balllan94@...>
> > 
> > Misty,
> > I would like to be allowed to respond to mike colletta
> in a 
> professional
> > and civil manner
> > I promise a well worded and truthful rebuttal.
> > Bruce <<
> > 
> > Bruce,
> > 
> > I almost decided to let you do that but then I thought
> about it. I 
> also 
> > remembered past issues. It's fine if you want to
> respond. In fact I 
> > think I have no right to deny you to do that. However
> I do have a 
> right 
> > to keep you guys from duking it out HERE in this
> forum. It has been 
> > disrupted enough with the petty arguments. So find
> another place to 
> > have your word wars because most of the members here
> are NOT 
> involved 
> > and should not be subjected to such displays of ego.
> > 
> > I'm sorry but I have to deny your request for
> membership again. 
> > Normally I would email this to you personally but I
> want everyone 
> here 
> > to know that this type of behavior is no longer
> tolerated. I just 
> do 
> > not have time to be referee to peoples personal
> squabbles. So if 
> you 
> > are here to research and learn then no problem. That
> is what this 
> forum 
> > is for. If you are here just to be a negative
> influence then please 
> > take it somewhere else. This forum is not a battle
> ground. 
> > ________________
> > Mike, 
> > 
> > I understand why the conflict made you want to post
> here but again 
> this 
> > is not the place for it. As I stated before most of
> the members 
> here 
> > are not involved in this conflict and shouldnt have to
> be subjected 
> to 
> > two grown men duking it out over something that they
> had no part in 
> or 
> > even knew about. Most are here to learn and share and
> move forward. 
> > ________________
> > Everyone Else,
> > Up til now this has been a free posting forum and
> nobody has been 
> > moderated. However that could change so please rethink
> your actions 
> > before posting here. 
> > 
> > So post it on your websites, start your own forums
> with your own 
> rules 
> > that allow someone to be "victorious". I see
> no victory in this for 
> > either side and having said that I wish you all well
> in your 
> research. 
> > 
> > Misty
> >
